transcript.text: A logo reads: “JoeRunner and Co.” by gabl, episode 1 “Edulympiad,” chapter 1 “Thursday.” The setting is a bedroom. On the desk next to the bed are some notebooks and an alarm clock. It’s 6:30 a.m. on May 27, a Thursday. There is a button labeled “snooze” on the side of the alarm clock. The alarm is going off: “beep, beep, beep.” Hover text: Thursday comes for us all.
transcript.html:
A logo reads: JoeRunner and Co. by gabl, episode 1 Edulympiad, chapter 1 “Thursday.”

The setting is a bedroom. On the desk next to the bed are some notebooks and an alarm clock. It’s 6:30 a.m. on May 27, a Thursday. There is a button labeled “snooze” on the side of the alarm clock. The alarm is going off: “beep, beep, beep.”

Hover text: Thursday comes for us all.

content.text: Hey there! Welcome to “JoeRunner and Co.”! My name’s Gabriel, a.k.a. gabl, and I can’t wait to share my passion-project comics with you. I’ve been drawing these characters for several years, and I’ve wanted to do a webcomic for… less years, but still multiple. Years. They’re… still a bit rough around the edges. I’ve been drawing cartoons for half of my life, but I haven’t been good about challenging myself. Hopefully, this comic will help improve my cartooning skills. Hopefully, I’ll be able to make people laugh. Maybe I’ll even be able to get a girlfriend. I dunno. It’s possible. … I look forward to taking this journey with you! — gabl
content.html:
Hey there! Welcome to JoeRunner and Co.!

My name’s Gabriel, a.k.a. gabl, and I can’t wait to share my passion-project comics with you. I’ve been drawing these characters for several years, and I’ve wanted to do a webcomic for… less years, but still multiple. Years.

They’re… still a bit rough around the edges. I’ve been drawing cartoons for half of my life, but I haven’t been good about challenging myself. Hopefully, this comic will help improve my cartooning skills. Hopefully, I’ll be able to make people laugh. Maybe I’ll even be able to get a girlfriend. I dunno. It’s possible.

… I look forward to taking this journey with you!

— gabl
